page.title: 18TRADE IN SELSEY
page.content: Selsey is a very big place.It is very well off for stores and trade.In the summer when we get all the holiday makers the shop owners look forward to them coming because they know they'll usually make a lot of money.There are big shops like International and Penny Wise Drug Store.We have two off- licences.We also have three banks and they are Nat. West,Lloyds,Barclays. We have a number of pubs and good food restaurants.The Stargazer has home cooked food and local sea food and delicious steaks, live entertainment, Children's Garden. T.R.P.Glazing have all sorts of glazing supplies, double glazing and roof glazing,patio doors. David Green Autos do all servicing repairs.We have our own printers in Selsey called Selsey Press.Video films make lots of money for shop owners.
